      • LynxDrive

        public LynxDrive​(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SpeedController leftMotor,
                 edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SpeedController rightMotor)
        Constuct a LynxDrive
        Parameters:
        leftMotor - SpeedController left motor, SpeedControllerGroup for more than one motor
        rightMotor - SpeedController right motor, SpeedControllerGroup for more than one motor

    • Method Detail

      • arcadeDrive

        public void arcadeDrive​(double forward,
                        double rotation)
        Arcade drive method using LynxDrive
        Parameters:
        forward - robot's speed along the X axis, forward is positive
        rotation - robot's rotation, clockwise is positive

      • curvatureDrive

        public void curvatureDrive​(double forward,
                           double rotation,
                           boolean quickTurn)
        Curvature drive method using LynxDrive
        Parameters:
        forward - robot's speed along the x-axis
        rotation - robot's rotation, gets applied along a curvature radius
        quickTurn - If true, overrides curvature and allows for arcade type movement

      • tankDrive

        public void tankDrive​(double left,
                      double right)
        Tank drive method using LynxDrive
        Parameters:
        left - left Speed
        right - right Speed

      • setEncoders

        public void setEncoders​(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Encoder leftEncoder,
                        edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Encoder rightEncoder)
        Sets the left and right encoder Distance per pulse and inversion should be set for the object before passing it in
        Parameters:
        leftEncoder - leftside drivetrain Encoder
        rightEncoder - rightside drivetrain Encoder

      • setVelocityPIDs

                            lynxlib.util.CheesyPID rightPID)

        Parameters:
        leftPID - left drivetrain Velocity PID
        rightPID - right drivetrain Velocity PID

        Parameters:

      • setMaxSpeed

        public void setMaxSpeed​(double speed)
        Sets the max speed to be scaled to when using closed loop control
        Parameters:
        speed - max speed - same unit as encoder distance per pulse

        Parameters:
        enabled - state of closed loop control
